channel.title: RSS Aggregator Feed
channel.description: An aggregated feed of Technology-related news

item.title: A new threat landscape is coming - this security firm CEO thinks nation-states will have weaponized quantum computers within the next five years
item.description: Palo Alto warns quantum computing will challenge current security devices while AI browsers, acquisitions, and observability tools reshape cybersecurity strategies.

item.title: Roblox CEO interview gets heated over child safety
item.description: Roblox CEO Dave Baszuki joined the Hard Fork podcast to discuss the gaming platform’s new age verification feature — but he seemed to get frustrated at the number of questions focused on child safety.

item.title: About This Account reveals the scale of X’s foreign troll problem
item.description: It’s long been known that X (and Twitter before it) is a major venue for foreign influence campaigns to meddle in American politics. Much of the focus has been on Russian troll farms, which the US government has targeted on several occasions. But the launch of X’s About This Account feature may have revealed the […]
